description.en:
"I've been cheating on you. Oh, and it's not just one guy. It's three. Sorry about that."

Back in middle school, Akiyoshi Sunao's first-ever girlfriend shattered his heart, and he swore off love. However, all that changes when he develops a crush on a girl in his university's film club. Just as he's finally beginning to move on from the past, he bumps into his ex-girlfriend. Little does he know that this is only the beginning...

To his horror, he wakes up in her body the next morning!
description.ja: 「実は4股してるの　ごめんね」。中学時代、人生で初めての彼女にヒドイ振られ方をした秋吉直（あきよしすなお）。「もう誰かを好きになることなんてない」と思っていたが、大学生となり映画サークルの先輩・小河原菜摘（こがはらなつみ）に惹かれ始める。しかし、そんな折に元カノ・西川檸檬（にしかわれもん）と再会。しかも翌朝目が覚めると、身体が入れ替わっていて…!?
description.es-la: "Te he estado engañando. Ah, y no es sólo un chico. Son tres. Lo siento". En la secundaria, la primera novia de Akiyoshi Sunao le destrozó el corazón y renunció al amor. Sin embargo, todo eso cambia cuando se enamora de una chica en el club de cine de su universidad. Justo cuando finalmente comienza a dejar atrás el pasado, se topa con su exnovia. Lo que no sabe es que esto es sólo el comienzo... ¡Para su horror, se despierta en su cuerpo a la mañana siguiente!
description.pt-br: "Eu tenho te traído. Ah, e não é apenas um cara. São três. Desculpe por isso." De volta ao ensino médio, o primeiro amor de Akiyoshi Sunao despedaçou seu coração, e ele jurou evitar o amor. No entanto, tudo muda quando ele se apaixona por uma garota no clube de cinema da universidade. Justo quando ele está começando a superar o passado, ele esbarra com sua ex-namorada. Mal sabe ele que isso é apenas o começo... Para seu horror, ele acorda no corpo dela na manhã seguinte!

description.en: Born into a family of saints, Philia’s childhood was filled with harsh education. Nevertheless, it formed her into a great saint and secured her engagement with the second Prince, Julius. But when she became too perfect and thus not cute in his eyes, Julius broke their engagement! That's why he decided to make her leave her homeland and make her a saint for a neighboring kingdom in exchange for money and resources. Philia was prepared to be treated miserably but what awaited her was an unexpected welcome! Confused by her new circumstances, she began to use her powers to help solve the citizens' problems such as creating a barrier against monsters and creating a cure for the illness that wreaked havoc on the land. With her new found position, Philia recollected her memories of being in a novel and the future outbreak of monsters that was to come. She used her knowledge and with the help of the people, they quickly dealt with the problem! But at the same time, the very same country that sold her off was also in danger-?!

Hwang Cho-min has been violently bullied since middle school. But when his estranged brother suddenly dies in a motorcycle accident, Cho-min finds out he was the leader of Imperial Gang, a huge gang. 

Now in possession of his brother's phone, Cho-min seizes this chance to get revenge on his high school bullies by ordering his brother's underlings to beat them up. description.ja: 彼氏をネットゲームで知り合った他の女に取られた茜。ストレス発散に雑魚モンスターを狩っていると、ギルドメンバーのアフロ男・山田に声をかけられる。同じギルメンの誼でフラれたことを愚痴るも、山田は無表情で「興味ない」とそっけない返事。挙句に「狩場を譲れ」と言う山田に「これだからゲームする男なんて！」とキレる茜だったが、好きなゲームをフラれっぱなしでやめられないと一念発起。ネトゲのリアルイベントが開催されることを知った茜は元彼に会えるかも……とお洒落をして会場に乗り込むが、元彼の横には新しい彼女の姿が……。直後、人混みに押され転んでしまった茜に手を差し伸べたのは超イケメンの黒髪男子。しかしそんなイケメンの無愛想な態度と「興味ない」という言葉で頭に浮かんだのはあのアフロ頭のアバター……この眼の前にいるイケメンこそあの山田だった!?　目の前で元カレのイチャコラを見せつけられた茜は山田を居酒屋に連行してヤケ酒に付き合わせる。酔いつぶれた茜が目を覚ますと、そこは見知らぬ場所……山田の部屋だった。もしかして私……!?
description.pt-br: Akane Kinoshita pegou seu namorado tendo um caso com uma garota de um jogo online e ficou completamente arrasada. Ela tenta desestressar matando uns bichos no jogo, e acaba desabafando sobre seu caso com Yamada, um jogador de sua guilda — mas ele responde com um "tô nem aí" curto e grosso. Entretanto, quando Akane decide invadir um encontro offline do jogo para se vingar de seu ex-namorado, ela ouve essas palavras marcantes ao vivo, e seu coração bate mais forte ao conhecer Yamada ao vivo...

He was suddenly left to raise his two children on his own, and he spent his days being pushed around by his children's every move, which he could not understand. One day, his son falls ill on a train and is saved by Kotobuki, a young pediatrician wearing devilish makeup. 

A heartwarming medical story of a father and son spun in the pediatric medical field!

altTitles.ja: バーサス

description.cs: Lidstvo bylo po stovky let utlačováno kvůli vzestupu a invazi našich přirozených nepřátel "démonů". Světu vládl "Velký král démonů" a jeho 47 "ďábelských vládců". Zatímco lidé žijí ve strachu, 47 lidí bylo vybráno z celého světa a zíkslai titul "Hrdinové" a připravují se na boj proti armádě velkého krále démonů. A nyní začíná plán jak zachránit lidstvo, jehož osud je teď na tenkém ledě.
description.en:
Centuries ago, humanity’s natural enemy, “Demons,” invaded the world and oppressed humankind. The Great Demon Lord and 47 subordinates known as Demon Lords have since dominated the world, while the human race lives on in fear.

In desperation, a last-ditch effort for humanity’s very survival is placed in the hands of 47 people gathered from across the world. These heroes will oppose the demon army and win back humanity’s freedom…or die trying!
___
**Compositor:** [bose](https://mangadex.org/author/aa8eb4f2-d4a2-4c4e-b6e8-2394f3b09b71)
___
[Official English (K MANGA) - United States only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10569/episode/349625)
description.ja: 天敵“魔族”の台頭と侵攻により、人類が虐げられ続けて数百年。世界は“大魔王”と、その配下である47体の“魔王”により支配されていた。人々は怯えて暮らしながらも、世界中から選び抜かれた47人を“勇者”と名付け、魔王軍に対抗すべく準備を進めていた。そして今、人類の存亡を懸けた決死の作戦が始まろうとしていた―――。
description.ru:
Уже сотни лет человечество вынуждено существовать под гнётом своих естественных врагов — демонов, сумевших захватить мир. В их главе стоит Повелитель тьмы, и в подчинении его находятся сорок семь Королей.
Однако среди людей, чей дух сломлен вековым страхом, было отобрано столько же наречённых Героев, готовых сразиться с демонической армией. И, кажется, отчаянная борьба за судьбу человеческой расы начинается прямо сейчас...
description.pt-br: A humanidade foi oprimida por centenas de anos devido à ascensão e invasão do inimigo natural "demônios". O mundo era governado pelo "Grande Lorde Demônio" e seus 47 "Senhores Demônios". Enquanto as pessoas vivem com medo, 47 pessoas selecionadas de todo o mundo foram nomeadas "Heróis" e estão se preparando para lutar contra o exército do Rei Demônio. E agora, uma operação desesperada com a sobrevivência da humanidade em jogo estava prestes a começar.

description.en:
Alexandra is the duchess of the Kingdom of Tarraconensis. It was only the day before the absolution event that she realized that she was the villainous daughter of an otome game! It's clear that she'll be denounced and her engagement will be broken tomorrow.
But I don't want to be condemned honestly! I'd rather show my eyes to the people who despised me! With only 24 hours left, Alexandra begins to make a breakthrough in her desperate situation.
description.id:
Alexandra adalah putri seorang duke dari Kerajaan Tarraconensis. 
Ketika dia telah sadar jika dia adalah seorang villaness dari sebuah otome game, waktu yang tersisa sebelum acara pembatalan pertunangan hanya tersisa satu hari saja!
Sudah dipastikan bahwa saat itu akan diumumkan pembatalan pertunangannya!
Tapi dia tidak ingin hanya menerima pembatalan itu! melainkan dia ingin melakukan perlawanan kepada orang-orang yang membencinya!
Hanya tersisa 24 jam saja, alexandra memulai langkahnya untuk bisa keluar dari situasi keputus-asaan ini.
description.pt-br: Alexandra é a duquesa do Reino de Tarraconensis. Foi somente no dia anterior ao evento de absolvição que ela percebeu que era a filha vilã de um jogo otome! É claro que ela será denunciada e seu noivado será rompido amanhã. Mas eu não quero ser condenada, honestamente! Prefiro mostrar do que eu fui feita para as pessoas que me desprezaram! Faltando apenas 24 horas, Alexandra começa a fazer um avanço em sua situação desesperadora.

altTitles.th: ใต้ร่มวันฝนพรำ

description.en:
Sisters Ju-eun and Hye-jin lived a miserable life. After the death of their mother, their 'father', who had always been absent from their lives, suddenly appeared. Hye-jin, the older sister, agreed to his suggestion: if one of them joins the 'Daesung Group', he will rescue them from their poverty-stricken life. However... three years after entering 'Daesung Group', she dies in vain. This left Ju-eun struggling with despair at her helplessness in preventing her sister’s death. But then, she gets a new opportunity when she is brought back in time and Ju-eun decides to take her sister's place by becoming the daughter of the 'Daesung Group' that killed Hye-jin.

---
Sisters Ju-eun and Hyejin grew up in absolute poverty. After their mother’s death, Hyejin accepts the offer to join their estranged father’s wealthy family. But when Hyejin turns out dead just three years later, Ju-eun is grief-stricken. She grabs at the chance to travel back in time and take her sister’s place where she meets the kind but mysterious Iho.

description.en:
After the World Youth, Japanese players are looking for pro careers in Japan and around the world.  
  
In order to fulfill their dream of World Cup 2002 in Korea and Japan, they must get stronger playing in various club competitions, home and abroad.

description.en: The earth is affected by unknown energy, the core expands, and natural disasters and doomsday come. Extreme heat, earthquakes, volcanic eruptions, floods, severe cold... natural and man-made disasters come one after another! Su Chen struggled through the apocalypse and finally entered the safe zone, but was betrayed by his girlfriend in the end! Reborn and returned to one month before the end. This time, I only live for myself!

description.en:
**"You don't need math for murder" - Miharu S.**    

Raizou Hiraga is a retired officer from the Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department. 
After learning that his grandson is stricken with a deadly illness requiring expensive treatment,
Raizou comes across a vacancy flier for the mysterious SS Agency and applies for the job. 
However, after taking his first job with 11-year-old Miharu Suzukaze as partner, he discovers 
that his new occupation is more than meets the eye…
description.ru: Достигнув пенсионного возраста, 65-летний Хирага Райдзо получает секретную высокооплачиваемую работу с риском для жизни, чтобы оплатить лечение внука. Устраиваясь на работу, он знакомится с 11-летней Михару и оказывается втянут в цепь загадочных событий… Но к чему это приведет? Автор манги «Копеллион», Иноуэ Томонори, с новой криминальной экшен мангой! Ученица начальной школы и строгий старик объединяются, чтобы буйствовать.

description.de:
Im Alter von acht Jahren verlor Ijin Yoo seine Eltern bei einem Flugzeugabsturz und strandete in einem fremden Land, wo er gezwungen war, ein Kindersöldner zu werden, um zu überleben. Zehn Jahre später kehrt er nach Hause zurück, um mit seiner Familie in Korea wieder vereint zu sein. Dort scheint alles friedlich zu sein, doch schon bald muss Ijin feststellen, dass das Leben als Teenager eine ganz andere Art des Überlebens ist. Da ihm nur noch ein Jahr in der Oberschule bleibt, muss Ijin neue Taktiken erlernen, um sich auf dem Schlachtfeld der Schule zurechtzufinden. Kann er ein Jahr Oberschule überleben? Oder wird die Schule vielmehr in der Lage sein, IHN zu überleben?

---
Die Geschichte handelt von einem jungen Koreaner, der bei einem Flugzeugabsturz seine Eltern verloren hat. Das Kind landet irgendwie in einem vom Krieg zerrissenen Teil der Welt und wird zu einem Top-Söldner im Teenageralter. Irgendwie findet er seine Familie wieder und beschließen, ein ruhiges Leben mit seiner Familie zu führen.

---

description.en:
At the age of eight, Ijin Yu lost his parents in a plane crash and became stranded in a foreign land, forced to become a child mercenary in order to stay alive. He returns home ten years later to be reunited with his family in Korea, where food and shelter are plenty and everything seems peaceful. But Ijin will soon learn that life as a teenager is a whole other feat of survival. With only one year of high school left, Ijin must master new tactics to maneuver his way around the schoolhouse battleground.

Can he survive a year of high school? Or rather, will the school be able to survive him?
description.es:
A los ocho años, Ijin Yu perdió a sus padres en un accidente aéreo y quedó varado en un país extranjero, forzado a convertirse en mercenario para sobrevivir. Diez años después, regresa a su hogar para reunirse con su familia en Corea, en donde sobra la comida y todo parece estar en paz. Sin embargo, Ijin pronto descubrirá que la vida de adolescente es otro tipo de supervivencia. En su último año de secundaria, Ijin debe dominar nuevas tácticas para resistir en el campo de batalla escolar. ¿Podrá sobrevivir a su último año? ¿O podrá su escuela sobrevivir a él?

---

description.en: The year is 2206, and mankind has only 100 years left on planet Earth. The "Nation-Toppling Battle", a war with the survival of each country on the line, begins!!

altTitles.zh-ro: Ai Yu Sha Yi Zhi Ye

altTitles.en: Night of Love and Murderous Intent

description.en: A decade ago, he was a beta at the pinnacle of his assassin career. But one day, while trying to save an Alpha child, he suffered severe injuries leading him to lose the sharpness and insight an assassin needs. Left with no choice, he retired and moved into a remote small town to start a new life under a new identity. Everything was going well until an unexpected visitor showed up at his house. The child he had saved years ago has now grown into the leader of an organization, and he’s coming after the beta with a powerful intent—
Short manga posted by Imo Ichirou [@cheesesama24] on Twitter.

title.en: The Blood Princess and the Knight

altTitles.ja: 血の姫と騎士

description.en:
I, who was a sacred knight, was defeated and captured in a battle against the vampire clan.   
"Oh? Letting you die? In your dreams! Accept my embrace, and in the future, please take care of me, my lovely daughter~"   
The silver-haired Queen of the Vampire Clan lifted my chin and smiled cunningly, her sharp canines drawing closer to my neck…

altTitles.en: A Monstrous Person’s Time: Madness Syndrome

altTitles.ja: けだものたちの時間～狂依存症候群～

description.en:
Airi Hirakawa, a model in a popular women's magazine, is suddenly hit by someone in front of her house and wakes up in a room full of garbage. Airi is confused when she is suddenly proposed to by Hirokazu Imai, the man who is her kidnapper and stalker.  
  
And this is how her life of confinement begins, where she suffers sexual violence and even toilet breaks and meals are managed.  
  
***WARNING***  
Contains abuse, kidnapping, rape, moral degradation, sadism etc.

altTitles.ja: とある科学の心理掌握

altTitles.ar: مانجا الملكة النحلة شوكهو ميساكي - مينتل-آوت

description.ar:
هذه القصة الفرعية من سلسلة توارو ببطولة الملكة النحلة شوكهو ميساكي

اقتربت انتخابات مجلس طلاب توكيواداي. شوكهو ميساكي، وهي صاحبة أكبر زمرة في المدرسة، دخلت الانتخابات غريمةً لنائبة رئيسة المجلس ومتحدية لها. وأثناء الانتخابات دخل [أثرٌ] مُعَيّن مدرسة البنات المخمليات، ويدعي أنه المصنف الأول السابق...؟!
description.en: The Tokiwadai student council election is approaching. Shokuhou Misaki, one of the leading candidates, is in the midst of an election campaign in spite of her own expectations due to the people around her and the fate of being the head of the largest clique...!!
description.id: Pemilihan presiden dewan siswa Tokiwadai semakin mendekat. Shokuhou Misaki, salah satu kandidat utama, tengah berada dalam kampanye pemilihan meskipun tidak sesuai ekspektasinya sendiri karena pengaruh orang-orang di sekitarnya dan takdir menjadi kepala kelompok terbesar...!!
description.ru: Приближаются выборы в студенческий совет Токивадая. Шокухо Мисаки, одна из ведущих кандидатов, находится в разгаре избирательной кампании, несмотря на ее собственные ожидания из-за окружающих ее людей и судьбы быть главой крупнейшей клики!..

altTitles.ja: わざと見せてる? 加茂井さん。

altTitles.en: Are You Showing It on Purpose?

description.en: Sudo, is an unassuming second-year junior high boy, who likes to draw. Kamoi-san, his classmate, is a JC in a short skirt who stands out everywhere she goes! These are the days between a flamboyant gal and an ordinary boy.
description.fr:
On suit l'histoire de Sutô, un jeune étudiant en seconde année du lycée plutôt banal voire transparent, mais qui a un passion pour les mangas et sait dessiner. Kamoi, la gyarû de sa classe, elle-même fan de manga, remarque les qualités de dessinateur de Sutô. 
S'installe entre eux une relation d'amitié, voir...
description.ja: 中学２年生の加茂井さんは、クラスに一人はいたようでいなかった、でもやっぱりいたＪＣギャル！　そんなクラスでも目立つ加茂井さんと、存在感のない地味な僕の物語。

title.en: Blade Skill Online: Gomi Shokugyou de Saijaku Bukide Kuso Status no Ore, Itsunomanika "Last Boss" ni Nariagarimasu!

altTitles.ja: ブレイドスキル・オンライン
ブレイドスキル・オンライン～ゴミ職業で最弱武器でクソステータスの俺、いつのまにか『ラスボス』に成り上がります！～

description.en:
The weakest piece of shit is the final boss!?
Overwhelmingly unlucky high school student Yuri. What he obtained was the VRMMO 『Blade Skill Online』, which could be used to change the luck value. "Summoner", which is considered to be the strongest occupation on the capture site, and "Bow", the strongest weapon. Furthermore, play the game world with extreme "luck value"! ――It should have been, but I was forced to grab false information!
The summoner is a garbage job, the bow is the weakest weapon, and the luck value is a fucking status!? Moreover, as a result of random character creation, the avatar is a beautiful girl!? Before I knew it, I was treated as
the last boss for some reason— !?

title.en: Tengoku de Akuma ga Boku wo Miwaku Suru

altTitles.ja: 天獄で悪魔がボクを魅惑する

altTitles.en: The Devil Fascinates Me In Heavenly Prison

description.en:
Set on a solitary island in the distant sea, a dangerous school life begins!

Kaoru Jahana, a boy who aspires to become a true man, begins his high school life on a solitary island in the sea. There, he meets a charming girl, Kanra, who is actually a demon who feeds on men's spirits...and it turns out that all the women on this island are the same demons!?

description.en: The anime, "Himitsu no AiPri," is now available as a cute full-color 4-Koma! The main characters are Himari Aozara and Mitsuki Hoshikawa, who enroll in the private Paradise Academy. Himari, who longs to be in AiPri, dreams of making 10,000 friends! She unexpectedly makes her AiPri debut?! She has a secret that she can't even tell her close friend, Mitsuki! However, it seems Mitsuki holds a secret of her own as well... (Translated from Ciao website)

altTitles.ja: 恐竜とカッパのいる図書室

ファミレス行こ。

description.en:
Satomi Oka moved to Tokyo from Osaka when he entered university. On his way home from a new year's party, he stops by a family restaurant and starts a part-time job...

---
- The MC is Satomi Oka, from author's previous work, [Let's Go Karaoke!](https://mangadex.org/title/212e9236-c0e3-4e85-ae92-087495820251)

title.en: Ofu-kai Shitara Tondemonai Yatsu ga Kita Hanashi

altTitles.ja: オフ会したらとんでもないやつが来た話

altTitles.en: A Story About an Offline Meet-up Between an Otaku and a Yakuza

description.en:
Miki Megumi is a loner and a closet otaku who's pretty devoted to her fan activities! She wants a friend who she can gush over her bias with... And when she went for an offline meeting with a follower from social media, they turned out to be a bona fide yakuza!!! Despite feeling like her life is in danger, after talking with him, she could tell that he's a truly passionate otaku!

He's overly sensitive, and any talk about shipping the reverse of his faves are a taboo. Plus, he turned out to be the troublemaker that his appearance suggests but being with him is fun and he's also dependable!!
description.ja: 三木めぐみはボッチでオタク活動に勤しむ隠れオタ! 推しについて語り合える友達が欲しい...と、SNSのフォロワーとオフ会をしてみたら、やってきたのはゴリゴリのヤクザ!!! 命の危険を感じつつも話をしてみると、やっぱり熱心なオタクだった! 繊細すぎるし逆カプが地雷だったりと見た目通りかなりの厄介者だけど、一緒にいると楽しいし頼もしい!!

altTitles.ja: メリーさん

description.en:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.

altTitles.ja: 怪獣８号 side B

description.en: Front-line stories of the Defense Force not covered in the main series!

altTitles.ja: あさひなぐ

description.en:
Everyone wants a fresh start in high school and that applies ten fold for Toujima Asahi. She hopes that she can create a new image of coolness at Futatsuzaka High School; a school that used to be all girls until recently, which explains the female population being 5 times that of the male and the extracurricular activities being female oriented. Change isn’t as easy as Asahi thought, but then she is introduced to Maharu, a strong minded girl, and to Naginata, a sport similar to kendo. Asahi realizes that Naginata is what she needs in order to become a new person, as the sport allows those who are not the most athletic to shine even on a national level.


Live action movie adaptation (2017): [MyDramaList](https://mydramalist.com/23246-asahinagu)

Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics as **Asahi Nagu** (2011)

title.en: Senpai! Waza to ja Nai n desu!

altTitles.ja: センパイ！わざとじゃないんです！

altTitles.ja-ro: Senpai! Waza to ja Nai n desu!

altTitles.en: Senpai! I Didn't Do It on Purpose!

description.en:
Sachi, a high school student, is confessed to by her love Jun, a senior who is a year older than her, and they are finally going out! However, as soon as she realizes that she is in love with Jun, Sachi has a constitution that causes her to have accidental pervert incidents with him every chance she gets! When Sachi tries to hold his hand for the first time, she accidentally puts her hand down his pants and she ends up deeply misunderstanding Jun when he asks her to pull out her hand. 

It's a sexy cute☆romantic comedy!
description.ja: 女子高生・幸は一学年上の憧れの先輩・純に告白されて、晴れて付き合えることに！ ところが両思いになった途端、幸は純に対して事あるごとにラッキースケベを起こしてしまう体質になってしまい…！? はじめて手を握ろうとしたら、勢いあまって彼のズボンに手を突っ込んでしまい違うものを握ってしまったり、あまつさえ手を抜こうとしたら手で抜こうとしてしまったりする、そんな一組のカップルが織りなすエロカワ☆ラブコメディです。
description.ru: Старшеклассница Сати наконец начинает встречаться с Дзюном, парнем который старше её на год. Она первая призналась, а теперь каждый раз, когда её переполняют чувства любви, богатые формы так и норовят создать неловкую ситуацию! Первая попытка Сати взяться за руки, случайно превращается в нырок в штаны Дзюна, оставляя его в полном недоумении. Встречайте эро-кавай ☆ лавком мангу!

title.en: I am the Last Villainess He Has to Kill

altTitles.ko: 나는 그가 죽여야 할 마지막 악당이다.

description.en:
When people get transported into novels, they usually end up as noble ladies, even if they're villains. But I ended up as the final monster that the male lead must kill—the daughter of the Demon King.

"Here’s your favorite finger necklace, Princess!"

Abduction and murder are the norm among demons. 
I can’t live with these creatures for 5,000 years! 
I just need to endure it, fulfill my role according to the original story, and move on to the next novel! 
Oh, God. How is this even possible? 
This isn’t some stray cat adoption; it’s like adopting the male lead! 
And the eight-year-old Kiel is saying some very ominous things.

“Can I eat you?”
"Well... I’ll raise you with care, so come kill the Demon King’s daughter later."
description.pt-br:
Quando as pessoas são transportadas para dentro de romances, geralmente acabam como damas nobres, mesmo que sejam vilãs. Mas eu acabei como o monstro final que o protagonista deve matar - a filha do Rei Demônio.

"Aqui está o seu colar de dedos favorito, Princesa!"

Sequestros e assassinatos são normais entre os demônios.

Eu não posso viver com essas criaturas por 5.000 anos!

Só preciso aguentar, cumprir meu papel de acordo com a história original e seguir para o próximo romance!

Oh, Deus. Como isso é possível?

Isso não é como adotar um gato de rua; é como adotar o protagonista!

E o Kiel, de oito anos, está dizendo coisas muito sinistras.

"Posso te comer?"

"Bem... Vou te criar com cuidado, então venha matar a filha do Rei Demônio mais tarde."
